channel.title: Learn Spanish - Survival Guide
channel.description: This podcast is about learning to speak Spanish in every day practical situations. There are pauses for you to repeat what you hear and the more difficult words and phrases are broken down for correct pronunciation and grammar. There are songs, games and other activities to make your learning enjoyable and help you retain what you have learned. We are the first podcast using this style of teaching, and with a state certified professional Spanish teacher, you know you're in good hands. So subscribe today and get started with your learning.
channel.itunes:author: David Spencer

item.title: Trivia - Did you know that.....
item.description:
Interesting trivia pieces from around the Spanish speaking world will leave you thinking......I didn't know that!

Visit www.myspanishconnection.com  for PDF files to all shows.  Click on "Store" tab, scroll to the bottom and click "All PDF bundle" It's only $12.99 for over 100 different files.  It helps to see the word that you are trying to learn!  Muy bien!

item.title: At Home
item.description:
Learn Spanish - Survival Guide podcast series.
Host -  Dave Spencer
Let my 12 years of teaching Spanish be your guide to proficiency in learning to speak Spanish!  We've had millions of downloads to date and we can help you learn to speak Spanish too!  Glad to have you aboard!

www.myspanishconnection.com/store
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn "Don't throw that away" and more!

item.title: About the host
item.description: This podcast is about me sharing my credentials and history with you about how and why I became a Spanish teacher.  I figured you might want to know a little more about the man who's been bringing your Spanish lessons to you all this time!
item.itunes:subtitle: A little personal history of my teaching

item.title: Different Kinds of Spanish
item.description: In this episode, we explore the regional variance of the Spanish language.  It's diversity comes from the history of fusing with different indigenous languages of the Native Americans.  Go to www.myspanishconnection.com and register for the blog and leave a five star rating on iTunes!  Gracias!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn why Spanish is different in different countries!

item.title: Quick Tips to Learn Spanish Faster!
item.description:
Hi Everybody,

I wanted to post these notes in the show description as well for you. 
You can and will improve your Spanish by applying these simple steps into your everyday routine!  Enjoy!

Watch more Spanish television programs
Watch DVD's in Spanish
Watch Cartoons in Spanish
Read children's books in Spanish
Listen to the radio on your commute in Spanish
Use the website www.quepasa.com to communicate with native speakers!
Send a text message to Google at 46645 for translations. 
Don't forget to go to iTunes and leave a 5 star rating!
item.itunes:subtitle: Quick tips to learn faster, better!

item.title: Dating and Love
item.description:

item.title: Numbers 1 - 100
item.description: Hi everybody! Here are the numbers that we told you about on the central button of your iPod! 1-uno 2-dos 3-tres 4-cuatro 5-cinco 6-seis 7-siete 8-ocho 9-nueve 10-diez 11-once 12-doce 13-trece 14-catorce 15-quince 20-veinte 30-treinta 40-cuarenta 50
item.itunes:subtitle: Counting up to 100 in this lesson!

item.description: Asking Personal Questions to Build Relationships

item.title: Months of the Year, Seasons and Weather
item.description: Months of the year, seasons and weather are learned here with time to practice what you hear to get it right!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn months of the year, seasons and weather!

item.title: Spanish Review Podcast 1
item.description: Review of episodes 1-3 in this podcast. This is just a review and NOT the presentation of new learning. You'll need to download the first 3 episodes for that.
item.itunes:subtitle: Review lesson of Travel Episodes 1-3

item.title: Greetings and Small Talk Conversation
item.description: Introductions, ask for and give your name, where you are from and exchange pleasantries. All with the convenience of building in time to practice what you hear!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn introducations, beginning conversation and more!

item.title: Days and Numbers 1-15
item.description:
In this podcast, you learn days of the week and numbers 1-15. Learning is facilitated by catchy little tune on the guitar with time to practice what you hear!

lunes, martes, mircoles, jueves, viernes, sbado, domingo

uno, dos, tres, cuatro, cinco, seis, siete, ocho, nueve, diez, once, doce, trece, catorce, quince
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn days of the week and numbers up to 15!

item.title: Travel Spanish Lesson 4
item.description: How to shop for postcards and stamps, how to rent a car/bicycle and how go on a site-seeing excursion. There is time built in to practice what you hear!
item.itunes:subtitle: Shop for postcards, stamps, car/bike rental and more!

item.title: Travel Spanish Lesson 3
item.description: In this podcast, we learn how to ask for extra items inside the hotel room (ex. towels) as well as buying sunblock/sunglasses and renting a chair/umbrella on the beach. There is built in time to practice what you hear to get it right!
item.itunes:subtitle: Asking for items in the hotel room and more!

item.title: Travel Spanish Lesson 2
item.description: Items of clothing for shopping, places of interest, common items to purchase in a store and food/drink in a restaurant. With built in time to practice what you hear!
item.itunes:subtitle: Shopping for clothes, sight-seeing and more!

item.title: Travel Spanish Lesson 1
item.description: In podcast, we learn asking for help and information about the resort.
item.itunes:subtitle: Asking for Help and Finding Information About the Resort
